Every moment is beautiful.

My name is Jeff, a Front-end Web Designer from Kitchener-Waterloo specializing in UX and Human Centered Design. I am known for my progressive dedication to refinement, craftsmanship, and attention to detail.

My continuous improvements in Adobe CC, HTML5, CSS3, and JS frameworks allow me to streamline my workflows to design, code, and optimize prototypes from scratch. Like an artisan in the world of haute couture, I strive for the best, effective, customized designs tailored to your clients' needs.

I turn client insights into action by refining every single design detail. Adapting to the ever-changing user requirements, I continuously monitor Key Performance Indicators (KPI), and update my skill set accordingly to design and develop more effective digital assets. Your clients and competition doesn't sit still. Why should your designer?

The creative Agile approach

Client focused, maximum impact

Not every designer notices patterns after years of experience communicating and understanding the needs of different end-users. Going through numerous customer personas, journeys, and behaviour, I came to the realization that our attention spans are getting shorter throughout the years. As a result, I follow an approach to create the most impactful and memorable experiences.

My contemporary design philosophy, along with my knowledge in coding, UX, and Interaction Design, allows me to deliver maximum impact to your clients. I have followed this approach to design high-fidelity mockups, UI, e-blasts, banners, and wireframes for clients at Sun Life Financial, DossierView, various tech startups, and BMO Financial Group.

It starts here

Let’s collaborate and create something great for your customers. From Web banners, e-blasts, prototypes, mockups, design concepts to development, I am ready to bring value to your creative endeavours.

Thank you for your visit.
